=The 12 main BPM6 standard services components. Classes. Residual and heterogenous categories should be broken down.
Other business services = residual category whose content is variable depending on the institutions (cf. BEA 2014:  "In the U.S. international economic accounts , the definition of other business services is expanded to include the BPM6 standard component of construction and selected components of the BPM6 standard component of personal , cultural , and recreational services . These items are included as part of other business services due to source data limitations for quarterly statistics."
